name: react-actions
description: Code Actions for wrapping components/elements with other components

commands.title: wraps the selected JSX element with a new element

reactCodeActions.reactWeb.enableCodeActi.description: Enables React Web specific code actions

reactCodeActions.reactWeb.folderPaths.description: Enable web code actions for the specified folder paths (useful for monorepos containing both web and native code)

reactCodeActions.reactWeb.wrappingElemen.description: Specifies the wrapping elements to show up in the code actions for web

reactCodeActions.reactNative.enableCodeA.description: Enables React Native specific code actions

reactCodeActions.reactNative.folderPaths.description: Specifies the folder paths to enable code actions with React Native wrappers (useful for monorepos containing both web and native code)

reactCodeActions.reactNative.wrappingEle.description: Specifies the wrapping elements to show up in the code actions for React Native

reactCodeActions.general.enableClassName.description: Insert tailwind className prop automatically e.g

reactCodeActions.general.enableRemoveTag.description: Enables a remove tag action that will remove the selected tag and its matching closing tag

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
